content: I'm glad I could help. I've had some experience with assembly and painting, like when I spent an entire Saturday afternoon assembling the wings and attaching them to the fuselage of the F-16 I built a while back. Anyway, back to the P-51 Mustang... I think I'll start by planning out my weathering approach and studying some reference images. I'll also check out some of those products you recommended. Thanks for the tips and advice!
